Potion fluid is the fluid form of conventional Minecraft potions. It can be obtained directly by brewing potions in the $(l:thermal:technology/machines/brewer)Alchemical Imbuer$(/l). Using a Minecraft potion bottle on a machine, device, or storage block that accepts potion fluids will fill the block with potion fluid and return an empty bottle.
Conversely, using an empty bottle on a block containing fluid potion will fill the bottle. 250mb of potion fluid is equivalent to one Minecraft potion bottle.
